lang: Pick up the kettle and pour water into the cup.
Pick up the kettle and put it to the right of the cup
Pick up the cup
Pick up the corn on the left and place it into the shopping cart.
Pick up the corn on the right and place it into the shopping cart.
Move the trolley to the right.
Move the trolley to the left.
Wipe the surface of the toilet lid with a cloth.
Wipe the tank lid of the  toilet with a cloth.
lift the toilet lid to open it
place the cleaning cloth into a bucket after wiping
press the flush button on top of the toilet
Pick up the coke bottle and place it to the left of the ice red tea bottle.
Pick up the coke bottle and place it to the right space on the table
Lift the tray.
pick up the fork from the orange bowl and place it on the tray
move the crumpled tissue from the table into the mug
pick up the orange bowl and place it onto the tray
arrange the tray neatly in the center of the table
pick up the empty mug and place it inside the tray
Reach to the key on the left gripper
Open the door
Press the button on the water dispenser to stop the water flow.
Pick up the white cup and place it on the table.
Turn off the faucet to stop the flow of water.
Pick up the right ruber glove and place it on the table.
Clean the table with the cloth
Pick up the cup under the dirnking machine and place it on the table.
Take a piece of tissue from the green tissue box.
Pick up the red cup and place it on the table.
Pick up the bottle on the table.
Pick up the green chip bag on the table.
Pick up the white bowl on the table and put it in the botton drawer.
open the top drawer
Close the top drawer by pushing the handle.
Pick up the green soda can on the table and put it to the left of the sliver can
Pick up the apple and put it to the left of the water bottle.
Pick up the apple and put it to the right of the water bottle.
Pick up the water bottle and put it to the right of the apple
Pick up the water bottle and put it to the left of the apple
Pick up the soda can in the drawer and put it on the vacant space on the top half of the table
Pick up the blue chip bag and put it inside the drawer
Open the top drawer by pulling the handle.
Close the bottom drawer by pushing the handle.
Pick one orange and put it on the table.
I am hungry, please put something on the table for me to eat.
Clean the table using existing object on the table
Pick up the coke on the top layer
Pick up the coke on the second layer
put the orange into the microwave
pick up the orange
pick up the orange and put it on the microwave
pick up the orange and put it vacant space on the right of the microwave
pick up the lid and put it on the pot
pick up the spatula in the pot and put it on the table
pick up the lid and put it far from the pot
close the waffle maker
pick up the food in the waffle maker and put it on table
pick up the turkey leg and put it into the waffle maker
pick up the toy bread and put it into the waffle maker
pick up the green packet and put it into the bowl
pick up the red chips bag and place it next to the bowl
pick up the small bottle and put it into the bowl
move the bowl to the center of the table
pick up the green packet and place it on top of the red chips bag
pick up the plastic cup from the stove and place it on the counter
pick up the olive oil bottle and move it to the counter
pick up the red detergent bottle and place it on the floor
close the cabinet door above the counter
pick up the snack bag near the coffee machine and put it on the counter
turn on the faucet and let the water run
pick up the towel and hang it on the rack
squeeze some soap from the dispenser onto the sink
open the toothpaste cap and place it back on the counter
wipe the counter surface with the towel to clean it
pick up the remote control and place it inside the open drawer
close the open drawer under the desk
pick up the notebook from the desk and put it on the shelf
push the chair closer to the desk
rotate the painting on the floor and place it upright against the wall
open the refrigerator door fully
pick up the bottle from the fridge door shelf and place it on the counter
take out the carton of eggs and put it on the counter
close the refrigerator door
adjust the items on the fridge shelf to make more space
pick up the milk bottle and pour it into the pan

move the RTX graphics card box to the side of the table
pick up the red Cheez-It box and place it next to the other snack box
pick up the Pringles can and put it inside the orange bowl

move the orange bowl closer to the milk bottle
pick up the Pringles can and place it on top of the RTX box

close the lid of the Pringles can and return it to its original position
